#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;


int main() {
	int t,n,m,k;
	string s;
	cin >> t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int on=0,off=0;
		vector<int> v;
		cin >> n >> m >> k;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin >> s;
			on = 0;
			off = 0;
			for(int i=0;i<m;i++)
			{
				if(s[i]=='.')
				off++;
				else
				on++;
			}
			v.push_back((on-off));
		}
		
		sort(v.begin(),v.end());
		
		int i;
		int flag = 0;
		for(i=1;i<=k && i<=n;i++)
		{
			if(v[i-1]<0)
			{
				v[i-1] = -v[i-1];
			}
			else
			{
				flag = 1;
				break;
			}
		}
		if(flag=1)
		i = i-1;
		k = k - i;
		sort(v.begin(),v.end());
		
		if(k%2==1)
		v[0] = -v[0];
		
		int sum=0;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			sum = sum + (m+v[i])/2;
		}
		cout<<sum<<endl;
		
	}
	
	
	return 0;
}
